name: fireside-gaming
description: This projects represents a full-stack web app that enables users to connect with friends new and existing to play games together. They can also search and discover new games to play.

scripts.install-backend-dependencies: cd backend && python -m venv venv && python inVenv.py run -m pip install --upgrade pip && python inVenv.py run -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.prepare-database: cd backend && python inVenv.py run manage.py makemigrations && python inVenv.py run manage.py migrate
scripts.flush-database: cd backend && python inVenv.py run manage.py sqlflush
scripts.create-backend-superuser: cd backend && python inVenv.py run manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && python inVenv.py run manage.py runserver
scripts.prepare-environment: npm install && npm run install-backend-dependencies && npm run install-frontend-dependencies && npm run prepare-backend-database

author: Thomas Anderson, Jeffrey Ganulin, King Nordee, Chris Williams
